fields.description: If there is a strings.xml in the /platform/android/res/values/ folder, it will overwrite the one in the Facebook module, therefore the module can not find the resources and can not work correctly. Need to fix the build script to merge all the xml resources.
fields.summary: Android: Facebook module won't work if there is a strings.xml in /platform/android/res/values/

comments.body:
https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/3870

For FR, please copy the strings.xml attached below to the folder /i18n/en/ or /platform/android/res/values/ and then run the example app in facebook/mobile/android/example/ in the [PR|https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_modules/pull/79].
---------------------------------------------------------------
                       strings.xml

{code:title=strings.xml|borderStyle=solid}
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<resources>
    <string name="some_string">some string</string>
</resources>
{code}
---------------------------------------------------------------
